welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chocen, Czechia! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this historical city known for its picturesque streets and lively local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chocen has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hradec Kralove Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hradec Kralove Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dolni Benesov Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dolni Benesov Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
